solution_line_template: Ed found {ed_limpet} shells + {ed_oyster} shells + {ed_conch} shells = <<{ed_limpet}+{ed_oyster}+{ed_conch}={ed_found}>>{ed_found} shells at the beach.
Jacob found {ed_found} shells + {jacob_more_than_ed} shells = <<{ed_found}+{jacob_more_than_ed}={jacob_found}>>{jacob_found} shells at the beach.
In total Ed and Jacob have {already_had} shells + {ed_found} shells + {jacob_found} shells = <<{already_had}+{ed_found}+{jacob_found}={total_shells}>>{total_shells} shells.
